title: Rise of the Dragon
overview: Legend has it that the Dragon God sat down in the divine realm, and if the one who gets the inheritance of the God, becomes the new master of the divine state. Various clans and gangs are striving for the inheritance of the Dragon God. The main character, Chu Qianye, is regarded as the son of a sinner because of his father's loss of the clan's treasure, and suffers from the cold shoulder.
